contentencoded: JPMorgan Chase is under investigation for its Chinese business dealings according The New York Times. The SEC is looking into whether the investment bank hired the children of powerful Chinese leaders in an effort to win business. The BBC's Martin Patience joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison from Beijing to discuss. Click on the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, August 19, 2013
teaser: The SEC is looking into whether the investment bank hired the children of powerful Chinese leaders in an effort to win business.

title: JPMorgan probed over hiring practices in China
